ai_summary.Response: This commit updates a documentation file regarding user type workload limitations. The change specifically modifies the link for Power BI documentation, redirecting it to a more current or relevant path within the Microsoft Fabric documentation. This ensures users can access the latest information on distributing Power BI content to external guest users.

ai_summary.Response: The commit updates a documentation file, specifically `docs/includes/user-type-workload-limitations-include.md`. The change involves a minor adjustment to a link related to Power BI's support for `UserType Member` and external guest users. The previous link pointed to a Power BI article within the `azure-ad-b2b` section, whereas the updated link now directs to a similar article under the `fabric/enterprise/powerbi/service-admin-entra-b2b` path. This change appears to be a redirection or update to the most current documentation location for this feature.
